price: 20. Ekoniangwisa nyoso oyo ezalaki o kati na mabumu na bango, na loposo lokola.
arabic: يُصۡهَرُ بِهِۦ مَا فِي بُطُونِهِمۡ وَٱلۡجُلُودُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: yuṣ'haru bihi mā fī buṭūnihim wal-julūdu
